properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.cache-timeout
properties.description: 缓存通用时长，单位秒，默认300

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.dynamic-expand
properties.description: 是否要根据接口参数动态展开，如果代码里设置不展开，动态展开也不生效。默认false

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.dynamic-expand-parameter-name
properties.description: 动态展开的接口参数名，默认expand

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.dynamic-expand-common-prefix
properties.description: 动态展开 统一数据的Path前缀，比如前缀是 data.body. 如果配置 expand=userId, 相当于是expnad=data.body.userId, 默认无

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.expand-strategy
properties.description: 展开策略，默认覆盖当前字段, COPY 策略可以避免反序列化失败

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.copy-strategy-format
properties.description: 展开策略为COPY时，Copy字段的格式，默认$%s

properties.name: spring.jackson.expand.can-expand-to-not-exist-field
properties.description: 可以扩展到不存在的字段，默认True
